Question: 言う
Comment: to go (e.g. "the alarm went ping"); to make a noise

Question: 思う
Comment: to think; to consider; to believe

Question: 私
Answers: わたし,ワタシ,あたし,あたくし,アタシ,わらわ,わし,ワシ,あっし,わっし,わい,ワイ,わたい,し,わたくし,わっち,わて,あたい,あて,わちき

Question: 見る
Comment: to see; to look; to watch

Question: 行く
Comment: to go; to move (towards); to head (towards)

Question: 来る
Comment: to come (spatially or temporally); to approach; to arrive

Question: 俺
Answers: おれ,オレ,おらあ,おり,おら,うら

Question: 今
Comment: now; the present time; just now

Question: 聞く
Comment: to hear; to listen (e.g. to music); to ask

Question: 知る
Comment: to know; to be aware (of); to be conscious (of)

Question: 出る
Comment: to leave; to exit; to go out

Question: 待つ
Comment: to wait; to await; to look forward to
